Module GNIOT_CRS_POS_PROJECT
Package com.gniot.crs.dao

Class AdminDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.gniot.crs.dao.AdminDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminDAOInterface
public class AdminDAOImpl extends Object implements AdminDAOInterface
The AdminDAOImpl class implements the AdminDAOInterface. It provides the SQL commands for each method to interact with the database for managing courses, professors, and student approvals.
